Content: The newly-appointed Adjutant General of the Sri Lanka Army, Major General A.A Kodippili assumed office this morning (12) at the Army Headquarters as the 28th Adjutant General of the Army during a brief ceremony. Major General Kodippili amid religious blessings signified the acceptance of his new office after leaving his signature in a formal document. Senior military Officers of under command Directorates of the Adjutant General Branch, staff Officers and Other Ranks joined the occasion.
